name: Color Sequence With Sound
description:
The game idea is this game / toy:  Simon / Senso 

Controls:

Clicking with mouse or pressing buttons on gamepad

(x-box gamepad fits best with because the naming and colors of the buttons are similar with the GUI used in the game).

Credits:

Sounds: Recorded from an old piano toy for kids by Les Productions Zvon

Graphics: Gui Buttons by WeaponGuy

Speaker Symbol by Delapouite

Font: Dimitri Font by Fontalicious

Programming and Game Developing was done by  me ( Tzoop ) using Godot Game Engine
